editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator
editedFacts.rooms: Breakfast nook, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Office, Workshop, Solarium / Atrium, Sun room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription:
This exceptional home is located on a fabulous private lot backing to a wooded reserve space in the picturesque community of the Woods at Jefferson. This M/I built home features efficient green construction and encompasses 3 bedrooms, 2.0 baths, a luxurious sunroom (12' x 12'), 1,644 sq ft of finely appointed living space, a full basement with a walkout lower level, an attached 2 car garage, upgraded landscaping by Oakland nursery, a paver patio and the list goes on!
This gorgeous property features an open floor plan you're sure to love! The main level includes a spacious family room with soaring cathedral ceilings. The family room opens to the home's upgraded kitchen which includes a gas oven range, granite counter tops, bay window eat-in and pantry. Also off of the family room is the den w/lead glass French doors and laminate floors(this is actually the home's 2nd bedroom and includes a closet). The gracious master suite includes a large walk-in closet as well as a private master bath. This level also includes the home's 3rd bedroom.
The lower level includes an additional 1,244 sq ft of flexible space which could be finished and used as a media room, rec space, home gym, you name it!
Looking for outdoor living space? This home has it all, including a 2nd story four season sunroom overlooking the home's private wooded, ravine lot! A set of stairs from this glamorous space offers access to the rear yard which includes a swing chair for relaxing and taking in the views! The walkout lower level offers access to the home's paver patio, a great space for entertaining and grilling! Off of the patio is a large storage shed (directly underneath the sunroom)!
The picturesque community of the Woods at Jefferson is located in Blacklick, a small city just 20 minutes from downtown Columbus. This Community combines rural charm and hospitality with modern city conveniences. The Woods at Jefferson is a community filled with fun loving, active couple and families. where friends, and fun await!
Nearby attractions include: Easton Towne Center, shopping, dining and entertainment and more.
Quick Facts: - 3 Bedrooms - 2 Baths - 1,644 SF - WALKOUT Full Basement - Private Wooded .18 Acre Ravine Lot Backing to Reserve Space - Licking Heights School District
